QuestData.Title: Grain Drain
QuestData.Description: We've got to salvage what we can.$b$bThis valley is the breadbasket of Kul Tiras. We feed the citizens, the militia, the army, you name it! Perhaps you've heard of our famous Kul Tiran sourdough bread? Goes great with sausages.$b$bMore importantly, those blasted Horde are getting in the way of our harvest! Lucky for us, the golems work 'round the clock to package the grain.$b$bI just need you to go out to the fields and grab as many bags as you can carry. I'll pay you for your trouble, of course.
QuestData.RewardText: Good harvest this year. Our people will eat well.
